idea-plugin.name: Cake Configure Completion
idea-plugin.description:
Cake Configure Completion is a PhpStorm plugin, that improves code completion and usage / definition detection for Cake Configurations.


Plugin provides the following features:
  • Auto completion for Configure::read and Configure::write
  • Jump to definition for configuration keys
  • Jump to usages for configuration keys
